episode50.name: 52 The Return
episode50.description: On this week's episode, the crew returns in a blaze of glory to look back at the 2016 football season, and what they've learned from spring and fall camp prior to the 2017 campaign. Logan, Colby and Chuck also fill you in on their lives since their last episode on November 2015 (the week after the Hunter Heave in Oxford against Ole Miss. People forget that).
episode50.keywords: Football, Hogcast, Woo Pig, Return, SEC, Hogs, WPS
